definition: to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)

sentences.english: Where all is obscure and unrealized the best similitude is a dream.
sentences.chinese: 一切都是模糊而非现实的，酷似一场梦。

sentences.english: Do not clutter up the page with so many illustrations that you obscure the message.
sentences.chinese: 不要在一页内放置过多的插图，那样会模糊讯息。

sentences.english: The feasibility of applying fuzzy mathematics method to appraise manuscript quality is studied. How to apply Method No.
sentences.chinese: 探讨应用模糊数学方法评价论文稿质量的可行性。

sentences.english: His vision blurred and a wave of dizziness washed over him.
sentences.chinese: 他的视线模糊了，一阵头晕目眩冲击着他。

sentences.english: The problem is modelled as a fuzzy multicriteria decision-making one.
sentences.chinese: 问题是仿照作为一个模糊的多目标决策之一。

sentences.english: At the same time, the North is going through a murky, ill-understood succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 同时，北方正在经历一个模糊而难以读懂的接班危机。

sentences.english: The relation between the filter sampling time and cutting error is fuzzed .
sentences.chinese: 将滤波器的采样时间与剪切误差之间的关系模糊化。

sentences.english: What advantage melanism brings in these circumstances is obscure.
sentences.chinese: 在这些环境中表皮黑化到底有什么优势似乎模糊不清。

sentences.english: Pixilation results from the codec having to deal with the rapid flow of information.
sentences.chinese: 从编解码器处理后的信息迅速流动模糊了的结果。

sentences.english: Anyone blurring these lines is iffy.
sentences.chinese: 那些模糊了这些关联的人都是悬乎的。

sentences.english: End-user requirements may be fuzzy or incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 终端用户的需求可能是模糊或不完整的。

sentences.english: The issue becomes vaguer because of the same origin of space and life.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题已经越来越模糊了，因为其实两者本属同根。

sentences.english: An MCU-based fuzzy control technique for fiber drawing machines is developed.
sentences.chinese: 文章提出一种基于单片机的光纤拉丝机模糊控制方法。

sentences.english: The paper describes operation dynamics of motor-cars with fuzzy mathematical method.
sentences.chinese: 该文利用模糊数学方法对车辆的运行动态进行描述。

sentences.english: And as happiness is the vaguest word on earth, it's hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 那可是世界上最模糊的词了，它让人绝望。

definition: to water down/to play down/to trivialize/to weaken/to become dull with time/to desalinate/desalination
